thread.title: Duchess spends Valentine's Day at Cambridgeshire RAF base
thread.title_full: Duchess spends Valentine's Day at Cambridgeshire RAF base | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Duchess spends Valentine's Day at Cambridgeshire RAF base
text:
Play video Click here to watch a video report by ITV News Anglia's Stuart Leithes The Duchess of Cambridge spent Valentine's Day showing off her flying skills during a visit to RAF Wittering in Cambridgeshire.
Sat at the controls of a flight simulator, Kate revealed she has what it takes to become a military pilot and was dubbed "a natural" by her instructor.
Credit: ITV News Anglia "She was extremely good - she was a natural. She was very gentle on the controls, very often people are too rough.... She said she hasn't flown before and wanted to understand what the feeling was like in the air."
â€“ Flt Lt Salter The Duchess also meet air cadets taking part in a half-term skills at a development camp in her role as royal patron and Honorary Air Commandant of the RAF Air Cadets.
The Duchess met some air cadets during her visit Credit: ITV News Anglia Last updated Tue 14 Feb 2017 Royal Cambridgeshire
